summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Taft Street, from 72nd Avenue South to 75th Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherewise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14287 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
